text: 【流量提醒】截至10月31日23时58分，您本月套餐内通用流量已用完，流量超出套餐后先按照0.29元/MB计费，超套费用达到5元时，流量可使用至1GB，以此类推；超套费用达15元后按照3元/1GB循环 计费。 您可放心上网。 流量不够用，您可回复6610订购10元10GB国内通用流量暖心包（不含港澳台地区），立即生效，有效期5天，到期自动失效。 流量使用详情查询请点击 http://m.sd.10086.cn/sdSLServer/aU9U9I9【中国移动】
trans: 【Mobile Data Reminder】By 23:58 on 31 October, your monthly general-purpose mobile data has been used up, and the data exceeding the package will be billed at 0.29RMB/MB, and the data will be available for use up to 1GB when the overage cost reaches 5 RMB, and so on; the overage cost reaches 15 RMB, and then the data will be billed at 3 RMB/1GB. You can surf the Internet with no worries. If you don't have enough mobile data, you can reply 6610 to order 10 RMB for 10GB domestic general mobile data package (excluding Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan), which is valid for 5 days and will be invalid automatically upon expiry. For more information on mobile data usage, please click http://m.sd.10086.cn/sdSLServer/aU9U9I9 [China Mobile]
